name: Personalised Wedding Samplers
description:
Applique and hand embroidery wedding samplers made to order and personalised using colours and details to suit the happy couple.
All of my textile pictures are constructed using vintage and recycled fabrics and trimmings which are then embroidered and embellished by hand using vintage buttons and beads.
All pieces are sold stretched and in a signed mount ready for framing (frame not included).
Size approx 40cm x 40cm.
 
IMPORTANT: When you have placed your order please don't forget to email me with the initials and wedding date you require and any particular colours or themes you would like included: hello@teenavallerine.co.uk
Please allow up to 8 weeks for delivery
t.x

P&P
UK Mainland - Parcelforce24 insured next day delivery.
Local pick up may be possible by prior arrangement only.

name: Personalised Hand Embroidered Letter Cushion.
description:
Your chosen initial hand-embroidered onto pure vintage linen and made up into a beautiful 16" cushion using vintage cottons. 
Hollow fibre cushion pad included.
Once you have placed your order I will contact you within 3 working days to discuss colours and fabric choices. Please ensure that you provide an up to date email address & telephone number and don't forget to let me know if your cushion is needed in time for a special date! Please allow up to 6 weeks for delivery. t.x
Post and Packing
UK and Europe £6.50
Rest of World £12.00 (buyer is responsible for import taxes).

name: Hand embroidered linen lavender pocket (Assorted pearl buttons)
description:
Hand embroidery on vintage linen trimmed with a pretty vintage button. Filled with a muslin sachet of Norfolk dried lavender harvested from my garden last summer. Backed with a piece of vintage cotton tablecloth. Each one is unique and individually stitched.

Size approx 18 x 21 cm

P&P
UK £3.50
Rest of World £5.50
